title: How to Make a Cheese Omelette
description:
Learn How to Make a Cheese Omelette with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Make-a-Cheese-Omelette

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to make a cheese omelet first crack two eggs into a mixing bowl then add two tablespoons 30 milliliters of water and a dash of salt and pepper adding water to the egg will make your omelette light and fluffy whisk everything together until the mixture is thoroughly combined next heat one tablespoon 14 grams of butter in a pan over medium heat until it melts and coats the bottom of the pan then pour in the egg mixture after about 10 seconds use a spatula to gently guide the egg into the middle and away from the sides keep doing this until the egg firms up now sprinkle 1/3 cup 42 grams of grated cheese on one half of the cooked egg and fold the other half over the cheese using the spatula finally cook the omelet for 30 more seconds or until the egg is completely cooked through enjoyto make a cheese omelet first crack two eggs into a mixing bowl then add two tablespoons 30 milliliters of water and a dash of salt and pepper adding water to the egg will make your omelette light and fluffy whisk everything together until the mixture is thoroughly combined next heat one tablespoon 14 grams of butter in a pan over medium heat until it melts and coats the bottom of the pan then pour in the egg mixture after about 10 seconds use a spatula to gently guide the egg into the middle and away from the sides keep doing this until the egg firms up now sprinkle 1/3 cup 42 grams of grated cheese on one half of the cooked egg and fold the other half over the cheese using the spatula finally cook the omelet for 30 more seconds or until the egg is completely cooked through enjoy

title: How to Make a Dog's Dry Food Tastier So He Will Eat It All
description:
Learn how to make a dog's dry food tastier so he will eat it all with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Make-a-Dog%27s-Dry-Food-Tastier-So-He-Will-Eat-It-All

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to make your dog's dry food tastier so it eats it all add a tablespoon of low sodium broth to the dry food right before you feed your dog you can also try sprinkling herbs over your dog's dry food to make it more flavorful like oregano rosemary and peppermint even just mixing some warm water into your dog's dry food can help make it softer and more palatable for your furry best friendto make your dog's dry food tastier so it eats it all add a tablespoon of low sodium broth to the dry food right before you feed your dog you can also try sprinkling herbs over your dog's dry food to make it more flavorful like oregano rosemary and peppermint even just mixing some warm water into your dog's dry food can help make it softer and more palatable for your furry best friend

title: How to Make a Frittata
description:
Learn How to Make a Frittata with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Make-a-Frittata

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to make a delicious cheese and veggie frittata first pre-heat your oven to 425 degrees Fahrenheit 220 degrees Celsius then add 6 eggs 1/4 cup 60 milliliters of plain yogurt and half a cup 60 grams of shredded mozzarella cheese to a large bowl season with salt and pepper then whisk everything together set the bowl aside next heat some olive oil in an oven-safe pan or skillet over medium heat add your favorite chopped or sliced vegetables to the pan like onions mushrooms tomatoes zucchini or bell peppers and cook them for 3 to 5 minutes until they softened pour the egg and cheese mixture over the vegetables and sprinkle 1/2 a cup 60 grams of shredded mozzarella cheese on top finally bake your frittata for 10 to 15 minutes you'll know it's done when the center of the frittata is setto make a delicious cheese and veggie frittata first pre-heat your oven to 425 degrees Fahrenheit 220 degrees Celsius then add 6 eggs 1/4 cup 60 milliliters of plain yogurt and half a cup 60 grams of shredded mozzarella cheese to a large bowl season with salt and pepper then whisk everything together set the bowl aside next heat some olive oil in an oven-safe pan or skillet over medium heat add your favorite chopped or sliced vegetables to the pan like onions mushrooms tomatoes zucchini or bell peppers and cook them for 3 to 5 minutes until they softened pour the egg and cheese mixture over the vegetables and sprinkle 1/2 a cup 60 grams of shredded mozzarella cheese on top finally bake your frittata for 10 to 15 minutes you'll know it's done when the center of the frittata is set

subtitles: to make the perfect messy bond start by putting your hair in a secure ponytail twist your hair from base to tip then wrap your twisted hair around the base of your ponytail in a spiral to secure try talking the tip under the hair time or use bobby pins to keep your bun in place create a Messier look by running your fingers through the front of your hair or pulling some strands out so they frame your faceto make the perfect messy bond start by putting your hair in a secure ponytail twist your hair from base to tip then wrap your twisted hair around the base of your ponytail in a spiral to secure try talking the tip under the hair time or use bobby pins to keep your bun in place create a Messier look by running your fingers through the front of your hair or pulling some strands out so they frame your face

title: How to Make a Rice Sock
description:
Learn how to make a rice sock with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Make-a-Rice-Sock

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to make a rice sock you'll need a 100% cotton sock without any metal or synthetic materials in it so it doesn't burn in the microwave open the sock and fill it 3/4 of the way with uncooked rice then tie the empty part of the sock into a knot to secure it or tie a piece of string around the end of the sock microwave the sock on high for one to two minutes keep an eye on it while it heats in case it starts smoking let the sock cool for 10 to 20 seconds then take it out of the microwave and apply it to your sore muscles for relief reheat the rice sock after it cools if you'd liketo make a rice sock you'll need a 100% cotton sock without any metal or synthetic materials in it so it doesn't burn in the microwave open the sock and fill it 3/4 of the way with uncooked rice then tie the empty part of the sock into a knot to secure it or tie a piece of string around the end of the sock microwave the sock on high for one to two minutes keep an eye on it while it heats in case it starts smoking let the sock cool for 10 to 20 seconds then take it out of the microwave and apply it to your sore muscles for relief reheat the rice sock after it cools if you'd like

title: How to Make a Soft Boiled Egg
description:
Learn How to Make a Soft Boiled Egg with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Make-a-Soft-Boiled-Egg

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to make a soft-boiled egg fill a large pot with enough water make sure there is enough water to cover the eggs next bring the water to a boil once the water is boiling turn the heat down to a rapid simmer then carefully place the eggs in the pot and set a timer for five to seven minutes after five to seven minutes turn off the heat and carefully remove the eggs rinse the eggs with cold water and let them cool for a few minutes enjoyto make a soft-boiled egg fill a large pot with enough water make sure there is enough water to cover the eggs next bring the water to a boil once the water is boiling turn the heat down to a rapid simmer then carefully place the eggs in the pot and set a timer for five to seven minutes after five to seven minutes turn off the heat and carefully remove the eggs rinse the eggs with cold water and let them cool for a few minutes enjoy

title: How to Make a Trifle
description:
Learn How to Make a Trifle with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Make-a-Trifle

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to make a trifle first to gather your materials you'll need soft bite-sized fruit like strawberries or blueberries sherry and whipped cream you'll also need jam or jelly and a custard that complement the flavors of your cake to start chop and mash your fruit then cut your cake into half-inch 1.3 centimeters thick squares layer the bottom of a tall glass bowl with 1/3 of your cake squares brush your cake with some sherry then cover it with jam or jelly next spread another 1/3 of your mash fruit on top of the cake and then add 1/3 of your custard over the mashed fruit top the custard with a thin layer of whipped cream before you begin again with a layer of cake continue layering your cake sherry jelly fruit custard and whipped cream until you get to the top of the bowl serve and enjoyto make a trifle first to gather your materials you'll need soft bite-sized fruit like strawberries or blueberries sherry and whipped cream you'll also need jam or jelly and a custard that complement the flavors of your cake to start chop and mash your fruit then cut your cake into half-inch 1.3 centimeters thick squares layer the bottom of a tall glass bowl with 1/3 of your cake squares brush your cake with some sherry then cover it with jam or jelly next spread another 1/3 of your mash fruit on top of the cake and then add 1/3 of your custard over the mashed fruit top the custard with a thin layer of whipped cream before you begin again with a layer of cake continue layering your cake sherry jelly fruit custard and whipped cream until you get to the top of the bowl serve and enjoy

title: Sandwich Recipes : How to Make a Tuna Sandwich
description:
To make a tuna sandwich, drain canned tuna, mix the meat with mayonnaise, mustard and chopped onion, and scoop the tuna onto toasted bread. Add veggies to finish off this quick meal as demonstrated by a professional cook in this free video on making sandwiches.

Expert: Susan Walker
Bio: Sue Walker owns her own freelance cooking business. She worked as a pastry chef and a full-time head cook for more than 10 years before deciding to start her own company.
Filmmaker: Luke Neumann
subtitles: hi I'm sue Walker and I'm going to show you how to make a tuna sandwich the ingredients are one can of tuna packed in water one tablespoon of mayonnaise one teaspoon of minced onion lettuce two slices of bread of your choice and two teaspoons of butter or mayonnaise open the can of tuna and drain out the liquid using a fork put the tuna into a bowl and break up the chunks into small pieces of tuna now mix in the onion and the mayonnaise toast the bread in the toaster take the toast out and spread the butter or mayonnaise on the toast now take half of the tuna mixture and place on one slice of the toast put two Leafs of lettuce on top of this place the other piece of toast on top and slice the sandwich in to put it on a plate and you are ready to serve and that is how to make it tuna sandwichhi I'm sue Walker and I'm going to show you how to make a tuna sandwich the ingredients are one can of tuna packed in water one tablespoon of mayonnaise one teaspoon of minced onion lettuce two slices of bread of your choice and two teaspoons of butter or mayonnaise open the can of tuna and drain out the liquid using a fork put the tuna into a bowl and break up the chunks into small pieces of tuna now mix in the onion and the mayonnaise toast the bread in the toaster take the toast out and spread the butter or mayonnaise on the toast now take half of the tuna mixture and place on one slice of the toast put two Leafs of lettuce on top of this place the other piece of toast on top and slice the sandwich in to put it on a plate and you are ready to serve and that is how to make it tuna sandwich

title: How to Make a Vinegar Cleaning Solution
description:
Learn How to Make a Vinegar Cleaning Solution with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Make-a-Vinegar-Cleaning-Solution

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: the acidity in vinegar makes it a great non-toxic cleaner that can be used all around your home you can use straight vinegar to clean toilet bowls chrome surfaces and your showerhead and door use equal parts of vinegar and water to clean faucets windows your refrigerator countertops and most other hard surfaces just spray or pour the solution into the surface you're cleaning then wipe it up with a warm damp cloth to clean your floor's with vinegar make a weaker solution by mixing half a cup 120 milliliters of vinegar with one gallon 3.8 liters of water then dip a mop in the mixture and mop your floors with it let the floors air dry when you're finished you can also make a vinegar cleaning paste for things like carpet stains grill grates and tile surfaces just mix equal parts baking soda and vinegar then apply it to the surface you're cleaning while it fizzles use a sponge or brush to scrub the surface clean rinse with clean water when you're finished whichever type of solution you make avoid applying it to natural stone or wood since vinegar can damage these surfacesthe acidity in vinegar makes it a great non-toxic cleaner that can be used all around your home you can use straight vinegar to clean toilet bowls chrome surfaces and your showerhead and door use equal parts of vinegar and water to clean faucets windows your refrigerator countertops and most other hard surfaces just spray or pour the solution into the surface you're cleaning then wipe it up with a warm damp cloth to clean your floor's with vinegar make a weaker solution by mixing half a cup 120 milliliters of vinegar with one gallon 3.8 liters of water then dip a mop in the mixture and mop your floors with it let the floors air dry when you're finished you can also make a vinegar cleaning paste for things like carpet stains grill grates and tile surfaces just mix equal parts baking soda and vinegar then apply it to the surface you're cleaning while it fizzles use a sponge or brush to scrub the surface clean rinse with clean water when you're finished whichever type of solution you make avoid applying it to natural stone or wood since vinegar can damage these surfaces

title: How to Make an Ice Cream Cake
description:
Learn how to make an ice cream cake with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Make-an-Ice-Cream-Cake

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to make an ice cream cake start by making the cake batter then bake the cake for 35 minutes slice the cooled cake crosswise to create two thin disks and place them in the freezer for several hours next soften the ice cream for a few minutes at room temperature then stir it until it has the consistency of spreadable icing place one cake disc on the plate and spread half the ice cream on top then add the second cake disc and spread on the remaining ice cream freeze the cake for 2-4 hours before adding the whipped toppingto make an ice cream cake start by making the cake batter then bake the cake for 35 minutes slice the cooled cake crosswise to create two thin disks and place them in the freezer for several hours next soften the ice cream for a few minutes at room temperature then stir it until it has the consistency of spreadable icing place one cake disc on the plate and spread half the ice cream on top then add the second cake disc and spread on the remaining ice cream freeze the cake for 2-4 hours before adding the whipped topping

title: How to Make Baby Food
description:
Learn how to make baby food with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Baby-Food

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to make baby food pick fresh ripe ingredients that are easy to puree such as bananas squash sweet potatoes and apples wash and peel the produce and cut it into small one-inch pieces then steam the food by boiling it in a few inches of water over medium-high heat for 5-10 minutes until all of the pieces are soft place the food in a food processor and pulse until it's completely smooth if your baby is under 6 months old pass the food through a mesh strainer to remove any solids before feeding themto make baby food pick fresh ripe ingredients that are easy to puree such as bananas squash sweet potatoes and apples wash and peel the produce and cut it into small one-inch pieces then steam the food by boiling it in a few inches of water over medium-high heat for 5-10 minutes until all of the pieces are soft place the food in a food processor and pulse until it's completely smooth if your baby is under 6 months old pass the food through a mesh strainer to remove any solids before feeding them
